title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 425.3 - Report of fire
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 425.3 - Report of fire

State Regulations

State Finance Law, section 54-e(2)(a), requires a
municipality whose fire department has responded to a fire on property under
the jurisdiction of the State of New York to submit a report to the Secretary
of State within 30 days after such fire. Such report shall consist of the
information as is required in Appendix 6 of this Title (i.e., a basic field
incident report, FRS-902F [1/76]) for such fire, which is made a part hereof, and a report of the firefighting costs incurred while fighting such a fire as
provided for in section
425.4
(c) and (d)
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
425.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
